title: Trade finance: Commercial invoices
dataVerified: Exporter name, importer name, goods description, invoice value, Incoterms, payment terms, invoice date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents invoice fraud including over-invoicing for money laundering and under-invoicing for tax evasion. Domain binding verifies exporter legitimacy. Customs valuation verification for import duties. Trade-based money laundering prevention. Critical for customs where invoice values determine duty calculations and detect transfer pricing manipulation.
